headache: Headaches can be caused by stress, dehydration, or lack of sleep. Drink water and rest.
fever: Fever is usually a sign of infection. Stay hydrated and take fever-reducing medication if necessary.
cough: Cough can be due to a cold, flu, or allergies. Try warm fluids and rest.
stomach pain: Stomach pain could be caused by indigestion or gas. Drink warm water and eat light food.
health_tips: Drink at least 8 glasses of water daily.
Get 7-8 hours of sleep for better health.
Exercise regularly to stay fit and strong.
Wash your hands frequently to prevent infections.
Eat fruits and vegetables for essential nutrients.
